import { Button, Card, Form, Input, Typography } from "antd" import { LockOutlined, UserOutlined } from "@ant-design/icons" import { AuthService } from "@shared/services/auth.service" import { IMAGES } from "@shared/assets" import React from "react" import { useMutation } from "react-query" const Login = () => { const mutation = useMutation((credential: any) => AuthService.login(credential) ) const onFinish = (values: any) => { mutation.mutate(values) } console.log("mutation", mutation) return (
Sign In

) } export default Login
